title: AHS: Apocalypse Timeline Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: Chop Chop! PS. What future show should I do? Preferably something new and current :)
i think people are just being so “unsmart” this timeline was not confusing at all...i think it was brilliant
Omg can you IMAGINE if they opened with "Return To Murder House"???!!! Literally would have been one of the most iconic season premiere ever!
You also have to watch the episode with queenie in hotel or else her presence wouldn’t make any sense. Just throw that episode in there right after you watch all of coven

I'm disappointed we didn't get any major battles with the witches using their powers. Fighting the mutants/undead/hell demons. That kind of thing. The final battle with Micheal was underwhelming. I did love the season though. The Witches are my favourite AHS characters.
description:
I break down the timeline of American Horror Story: Apocalypse to get a better idea of the overall story.
